articles.description: Elon Musk and Jeff Bezos have been battling for the top spot on the Bloomberg wealth index since the Tesla founder took over in January.
articles.content:
Elon Musk just hit a new milestone: He made a record $25 billion in one day.
Tesla Inc.s 20% jump on Tuesday -- its biggest in more than a year -- pushed the billionaire founders fortune to $174 bil… [+1772 chars]

articles.description: Morgan Stanley Private Equity Asia (MSPEA), a private equity platform that acquired 20 percent stake in ZCL for Rs 150 crore in 2016, has also exited the company for an amount of Rs 390 crore.
